snippet: Several couples lined up early on Monday in Anchorage to apply for marriage licenses a day after a federal judge struck down the state’s ban on same-sex unions.
lead_paragraph: Several couples lined up early on Monday in Anchorage to apply for marriage licenses a day after a federal judge struck down the state’s ban on same-sex unions.

headline.main: Alaska: Same-Sex Couples Apply to Marry
headline.print_headline: Alaska: Same-Sex Couples Apply To Marry

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
